typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as integer,
		Title as string,
		genresgenregenre as string,
		YEAR as short,
		Rating as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CDLFlowSourcePractice
CDLFlowSourcePractice sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		movies as integer,
		Title as string,
		genresgenregenre as string,
		YEAR as short,
		Rating as short
	),
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'adftutorial',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
